title: Best of The Program | Guest: Melissa Rolfe | 6/22/20
description:
The unrest isn’t about race. It’s about Marxism. Glenn looks at USSR defector Tomas David Schuman’s warning that a four-step KGB method of demoralization, destabilization, crisis, and normalization has been used to flip America for decades. Statues across America are being torn down, but oddly not the Marxist ones. Melissa Rolfe, stepmother of the former Atlanta officer who shot Rayshard Brooks, Garrett Rolfe, joins after being fired supposedly over her connection to him.
